title: how to put windows xp on acer aspire?

forumNotes.author: chloeshadowboowe
forumNotes.content: how to put windows xp on acer aspire?

forumNotes.author: dsolomon
forumNotes.content:
hmmm.....well....lets see..  
if you are interested in just installing a fresh copy of windows xp, then i would be sure to get the   
correct SATA/IDE (mass storage) drivers rounded up.  
then either put them on a floppy disk and hit F6 during windows xp install disc boot up process.  
or just use nLite to slipstream the driver directly into your xp install disc...  
does that help any?

forumNotes.author: Joshua
forumNotes.content:
> how to put windows xp on acer aspire?
If you mean aspire one ? ![:loleverybody:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/loleverybody.gif)   
Then look here: [http://www.boot-land...p;hl=aspire one](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=8628&hl=aspire+one "External link")  

Joshua

forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:
> Then look here: [http://www.boot-land...p;hl=aspire one](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=8628&hl=aspire+one "External link")
...and ignore people suggesting that you ***need*** a USB CD-ROM..... ![:loleverybody:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/loleverybody.gif)   

You don't necessarily need one, a more common USB stick or USB hard disk will do. ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)   

Choose one among different methods here:  
[http://www.msfn.org/...p?showforum=157](http://www.msfn.org/board/index.php?showforum=157 "External link")  

This one:  
[http://www.msfn.org/...30-t120444.html](http://www.msfn.org/board/30-t120444.html "External link")  
should be the easier one.  

Read these also:  
[http://www.msfn.org/.../2-t112630.html](http://www.msfn.org/board/2-t112630.html "External link")  
[http://www.msfn.org/...30-page-22.html](http://www.msfn.org/board/0x0000007b-blue-screen-error-during-text-setup-t112630-page-22.html "External link")  
[http://www.msfn.org/...ge-t129902.html](http://www.msfn.org/board/hal-dll-not-found-started-2nd-stage-t129902.html "External link")  

jaclaz
